scripts.public: rm -rf public && rm -rf dist && mkdir -p public && mkdir -p dist
scripts.public2: rm -rf publicTemp && rm -rf distTemp && mkdir -p publicTemp && mkdir -p distTemp
scripts.move-files: rm -rf public && rm -rf dist && mv publicTemp public && mv distTemp dist
scripts.build-js: NODE_PATH=. browserify -t [ babelify --presets react,es2015,stage-0 --plugins transform-decorators-legacy ] src/client/app.js -o public/app.js
scripts.build-prod-js: NODE_PATH=. browserify -t [ babelify --presets react,es2015,stage-0 --plugins transform-decorators-legacy ] src/client/app.js -g [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify -p bundle-collapser/plugin | uglifyjs --compress --mangle > publicTemp/app.js
scripts.watchify-js: NODE_PATH=. watchify -t [ babelify --presets react,es2015,stage-0 --plugins transform-decorators-legacy] src/client/app.js -o public/app.js
scripts.dist: babel src/server/*.js src/server/**/*.js src/server/**/**/*.js --out-dir dist --presets es2015,stage-0
scripts.copy-files: cp -R src/client/css/ public/css/ && cp src/client/index.html public/index.html && cp -R src/client/js/ public/js/ && cp -R src/client/font/ public/font/ && cp -R src/client/images/ public/images/ && cp -R src/client/slick/ public/slick/ && cp -R src/client/sounds public/sounds/
scripts.copy-files2: cp -R src/client/css/ publicTemp/css/ && cp src/client/index.html publicTemp/index.html && cp -R src/client/js/ publicTemp/js/ && cp -R src/client/font/ publicTemp/font/ && cp -R src/client/images/ publicTemp/images/ && cp -R src/client/slick/ publicTemp/slick/ && cp -R src/client/sounds publicTemp/sounds/
scripts.build: npm run public && npm run build-js && npm run copy-files
scripts.build-prod: npm run public2 && npm run build-prod-js && npm run copy-files2 && npm run move-files
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run dist && npm run serve
scripts.start-d: npm run build && npm run dist && npm run serve-d
scripts.start-api: npm run dist && npm run serve
scripts.start-api-d: npm run dist && npm run serve-d
scripts.minify-public: minify public/js/adapter.js --template {{filename}}.{{ext}} && minify public/slick/slick.js --template {{filename}}.{{ext}} && minify public/app.js --template {{filename}}.{{ext}}
